## Source: khulnasoft-package-analysis (7e55b9fb271d1d1fcc3ac27783bc95ed7cbce8762d35cd7f2635490e25b9263b)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'twk-boilerplate-template' @ 1.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
